name: SnakEscape: Remastered
description:
Winner at Russian Developers Cup 2015!

SnakEscape is a turn-based logic game tuning the traditional Snake gameplay concept upside down! This time You will mantle the role of the food, running away from the pursuing Snakes.

Your goal is simple: collect as many energy stars on the level as possible for traversing through the floating islands. But be cautious: sly snakes will attempt to trap you!

Key features:

  • More than 100 different single-player levels that will test your brains.
  • 4 thematic seasons: spring, summer, autumn and winter. Each season has it's unique visual and gameplay features!
  • 3 additional level packs specialy available for the Remasterd Edition of the original game: Garden of Eden, Summer Madness & Winter Night.
  • The return of the classic: play as a snake, grow it by collecting the stars and don't allow apples to escape from the level!
  • Global leaderboards for "Snake Mode" that display the results of players worldwide. Be the best!
  • Done with the game? Try out the co-op game mode! Play with your friend, solve puzzles and beware snakes together!
  • Already finished all game built-in modes? It's the time for Workshop! Check the levels created by other players or create your own levels with the level editor and share with the community!
